addr: 7080 Hollywood Blvd Suite 1100 Los Angeles , CA 90028
title: CANCELLED - Class 101 - Discover Our Church Family (Los Angeles)
desc: Class 101 is a basic introduction to our church family and is designed to clearly explain who and what our church is. This class covers Our Salvation, Our Statements, Our Strategy and Our Structure. You will hear the history of Saddleback, learn how living the 5 biblical purposes are necessary in order to fulfill God?s purpose for your life, and discover plans for the future of Saddleback. At the end of Class 101 you will have the opportunity to fill out, sign, and submit the Membership Application. Base CLASSes are designed for attendees over 13 years of age.  Please note that childcare is not available during CLASSes. *Parking is $10 cash and is located in the public parking garage directly behind offices (enter through the alley off of LaBrea, and take the catwalk located on the 2nd floor of the garage over to 7080 office building. Take the elevator located in the lobby up to the 11th floor to our offices). Dinner will be provided.
